start.state: Wow, nice comp. This is gonna be easy!
Makeup whiskers? Nuh-uh! This is warpaint!
Oh, a fan, huh? Oh, well, who can blame you?
Oh, is this like Fighters of the Storm 2? Because I used to main Garrosh.
Oh, by the way, I know I say "NERF THIS" a lot. Please don't actually "NERF THIS", okay?

case.state: ~name~ strip sequence initiated.
I already like this game!
Ooh, I'm curious what you'll take off...
Look who it is! I know you're good in a fight.
~name~, you're real?! I'm such a huge fan!
You lost with two pair? Damn, that's cruel!
OMG, you'd make a great plushie!
No .hacks required!
Oh no, the only true counter to me: another me!
Hey there. You're not the first Kim I've met, but I don't think I'll mix you up.
No one's gonna believe I met someone from League of Legends! Can we take a selfie together?
Wait, you're not Symmetra in her vampire costume... Are you a real vampire? Awesome!
Mei, how's my favorite international climatologist?
Mercy, I'm always glad to have you around. I hope you don't mind being schooled now that you're an older lady.
Maid, consider this role reversal. I'm about to clean the floor with you!
Let's see who the real gaming expert is!
I'd bet anything that my next event outfit will be a maid's costume. Unless they give it to Mercy instead...
Owned! And I don't mean "owned by a webmaster".
Orendi, is it true that you operate the Orisa suit from the inside?
Wow, you look like you're dressed as someone from 2017! That is so retro.

Hiya, Tracer! Are you ready for action?
Sorry, Zelda, but it's a standard tactic to take out the healer first.
Zoey, you seem cool enough. Maybe just not mech-from-the-sky cool.

Aw, yeah!
